msItem.title: Egils saga einhenda og Ásmundar berserkjabana
msItem.incipit: Hertriggur hefur kongur heitid. Hann reide firer Austur
msItem.explicit: og hefur sydann einginn hlutur fundest af henne og óngu þuy sem a var. Lukumm vier so þessare søgu

msItem.title: Illuga saga Gríðarfóstra
msItem.incipit: Kongur sa ried fyrer Dánmórk er Hringur hiet
msItem.explicit: og lukum vier so sógu þætte af Jllaúga Grydar fostra

msItem.title: Hálfdanar þáttur svarta og Haralds hárfagra
Hálfdanar þáttr svarta ok Haralds hárfagra
msItem.rubric: Søgu þattur af Haldane konge hinumm suarta og uppwexte Harallds harfagra sm kalladur var Döfra fostri
msItem.incipit: Hallan hefur kongur heited og kalladur hinn suarte
msItem.explicit: og endumm vier so þennann þatt med so ornu nidur læge

msItem.title: Victors saga og Blávus
msItem.rubric: Hier birast sagann af Wictor oc Blaus
msItem.incipit: Marga merkelega hlute heirdumm vier sagda af Herra Häkone Noregs konge Magnus sine
msItem.explicit: og endast hier þesse saga af Wictor og Blaus

msItem.title: Jarlmanns saga og Hermanns
msItem.incipit: Meystarinn Wirgelyus hefur samsett mórg fræde y bok þeire er Saxa fræde heiter
msItem.explicit: og endast hier þesse þeira saga med so ordnu nidur læge

msItem.title: Úlfs saga Uggasonar
msItem.rubric: Sagann af Wlfe Ugga syne og Arius
msItem.incipit: Wgge hefur kongur heited er riede fyrer Nordmandia
msItem.explicit: skilldu þeir fostbrædur alldri sina vinattu og lykur so sógu þessare med so ordnu nidur læge. Ender.

msItem.title: Þorsteins þáttur bæjarmagns
Þorsteins þáttr bæjarmagns
msItem.rubric: Hier byriar sógu þatt fra Þorsteine bæar magn
msItem.incipit: J þann tyma sem Häkon jall Sigurdar son riede firer Noreige biö sä bonde y Gaular dal er Brynjolfur hiet
msItem.explicit: og lyukumm vier so ad seigia af Thorsteyne bæarbarn og hanz afrecks werkumm og sogu þætte

msItem.title: Bærings saga
msItem.rubric: Hier biriar søgu af Bæring fägra
msItem.incipit: So er skrifad ad a dógum Alexander päfa riede firer Sax lande hertöge sä er Bæring hiet
msItem.explicit: og lykur so þessare søgu, ad so ordnu nidur læge af Bæring fagra

msItem.title: Fertrams saga og Platos
msItem.rubric: Hyer biriast sagann af Fertram og Plätö
msItem.incipit: Artus hiet kongur mektugur og storaudugr
msItem.explicit: og endar so þeßa Fertrams sogu. Telos

msItem.title: Göngu-Hrólfs saga
msItem.rubric: Hier biriar sógu af Hrolfe Sturlaugs syne
msItem.incipit: Hreggvidur er kongur nefndur. Hann atte ad rada firer Holmgarda ryke
msItem.explicit: madur rak flottann sem fir var fra sagt og snere so aftur til valsins
msItem.note: Text cuts off near the end of ch. 33 (Guðni Jónsson's 1954 ed.)

msItem.title: Drauma-Jóns saga
msItem.rubric: Hier biriar sagann af Drauma Jöne
msItem.incipit: Heindrik er nefndur jarl og sat y Saxlande
msItem.explicit: og lykur so þessum sógu þætte af drauma Jone. Ender

foliation.p: Foliated in pencil in the outer bottom corner of every tenth page and at the end of each saga, as well as on fols. 207 and 211. Incorrect pagination on every tenth page, starting with fol. 31, has been corrected.

supportDesc.condition: Some offsetting of red ink on fol. 24v. Rubbing on multiple leaves, especially fols. 161-163, 167v and 237, has made some text difficult to read. Fols. 220-224 are heavily worn. Several leaves stained, and some wear at the edges of leaves, but in otherwise fair condition

layout.note: Written area varies widely by scribe.

handDesc.handNote: Written in 'various hands' according to Kålund

decoDesc.decoNote: Title decorated with red ink on fol. 25r

additions.p: Fol. 24r dated 21 februarij Anno 1743. Multiple autographs on fol. 24v: Einar Magnus Son, Bæring Biarnar Son, Jon Haldors and Gudmundur Jons Syne, as well as the phrase Enu preiddum wngum manne. Some faded marginalia on fol. 64v. On fol. 65r the names Jon Haldorsson and Bæring Biarna son are crossed out. Inscriptions on fol. 141v: Þessa bok a Jon Haldors Son Virduglagum heidums manne, Vid for neme Herra Gull smids, Jone Sygurd Sin Voge and Hiol. Autograph in the lower margin of fol. 237v: Bæring Biarnason ad Hofi [?]

binding.p: Rebound during the early 20th century in marbled, half-canvas boards.

provenance.name: Autograph of Rasmus Rask at the head of fol. 1r.

revisionDesc.change: Created as subset of full file on handrit.is.
Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Inserted origDate and origPlace elements based on previous data, now removed.
Extracted pagination and page dimension data from previous version.
Extracted layout data from previous version.
Supplied information from Handrit and Kålund catalogs.
